description: Frontend registration UI needs the backend `registerOrganization` function to call.
mitigation_plan: Define API contract early; frontend can develop against a mocked function.

description: Post-login routing logic depends on custom claims being set correctly during user/tenant registration.
mitigation_plan: Early integration testing of the full registration-to-login flow in Sprint 1.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks entire application access for new users.

description: The client-side query for pending records requires the backend Firestore security rules and composite index to be deployed first.
mitigation_plan: Prioritize `firestore.rules` and `firestore.indexes.json` implementation early in Sprint 2.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire Supervisor dashboard functionality.

description: The scheduled Sheets export function requires the secure OAuth token handling mechanism to be in place to authenticate.
mitigation_plan: Implement and thoroughly test the OAuth flow before starting the export logic.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire Google Sheets export feature.
